name: Empty E-mail field  in  Sign in form
id: stories/ForgotPw.story;Empty E-mail field  in  Sign in form

testSteps.description: Given the user accesses the conference management home page
When user clicks the Your Account button
And clicks the Forgot password link
Then new pop up will appear
And then click Continue button leaving E-mail field behind

title: Empty E-mail field  in  Sign in form
